Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with delays due to a temporary shortage of available staff.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 Allow extra travel time.
